import React from 'react'; import '../Css/ElectronicsFilter.css'; import all from '../Images/5110770.png'; import MensSports from '../Images/MensSports.png'; import WomensSports from '../Images/WomenSports.png'; import games from '../Images/Sports.png'; const SportsFilter = ({ selectedSubCategory, onSubCategoryChange, onPriceChange }) => { return(
onSubCategoryChange('')}>
All Sports
onSubCategoryChange('MensSportswear')}>
Mens Sportswear
onSubCategoryChange('WomensSportswear')}>
Womens Sportswear
onSubCategoryChange('Game')}>
Game Accessories
onPriceChange(parseInt(e.target.value, 10))} />
{selectedPrice} /-
); }; export default SportsFilter;
